readme:
# **AI-Powered Social Media Content Generator & Publisher** ğŸš€

This **AI-driven n8n workflow** automates social media content **creation and publishing** across **LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter (X)**. It generates **engaging, platform-optimized posts** using **Google Gemini AI** , based on user inputs such as a **post title, keywords, and an uploaded image**. The workflow ensures seamless content generation and publishing, making it a perfect tool for **marketers, business owners, influencers, and content creators**.

* * *

## **ğŸŒŸ Features & Benefits**

âœ… **AI-Generated Social Media Posts** â€“ Uses **Google Gemini AI** to create high-quality, optimized content.  
âœ… **Multi-Platform Support** â€“ Automatically generates posts for **LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter (X)**.  
âœ… **Hashtag & SEO Optimization** â€“ Includes **trending hashtags** to enhance visibility and engagement.  
âœ… **Image Upload & Processing** â€“ Allows **image uploads** for Instagram and Facebook using **imgbb** and Facebook Graph API.  
âœ… **Automated Publishing** â€“ Posts are **automatically published** on all selected platforms.  
âœ… **Custom Call-to-Action** â€“ Each platform's post is **optimized with CTAs** for better engagement.  
âœ… **User-Friendly Form Submission** â€“ Easy-to-use form where users can enter **post titles, keywords, links, and images**.  
âœ… **Performance Tracking** â€“ Provides **confirmation and tracking links** for published posts.

* * *

## **ğŸ“Œ How It Works**

1ï¸âƒ£ **User Submission Form**

  * Fill out the form with **Post Title, Keywords, and an Optional Link**.
  * Upload an **image** for **Instagram & Facebook posts**.



2ï¸âƒ£ **AI Content Generation**

  * **Google Gemini AI** generates **optimized content** for each platform.
  * The AI ensures **professional, engaging, and audience-specific** content.



3ï¸âƒ£ **Content Review**

  * Users **review and approve** the AI-generated content before publishing.



4ï¸âƒ£ **Automated Publishing**

  * Posts are **automatically published** on **LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter (X)**.
  * Uses **Facebook Graph API, LinkedIn API, Twitter API, and Instagram API**.



5ï¸âƒ£ **Post Confirmation & Tracking**

  * Get links to **track published posts** on each platform.



* * *

## **ğŸ› ï¸ Prerequisites**

Before using this workflow, ensure you have:

  * âœ… **n8n Instance** (Cloud or Self-Hosted)
  * âœ… **Social Media API Credentials** (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter API)
  * âœ… **Google Gemini AI API Key**
  * âœ… **imgbb API Key** (for image hosting)



* * *

**Get N8n**  
[My Affiliate Link](http://n8n.syncbricks.com/)  
**Buy My Book:**  
[Mastering n8n on Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0F23GYCFW)

**Full Courses & Tutorials:**  
<http://lms.syncbricks.com>

## **ğŸ“º YouTube Video Tutorial ğŸ¥**

Watch the **step-by-step tutorial** on how to set up and use this **n8n workflow template** :

ğŸ”— **[YouTube Tutorial - AI-Powered Social Media Posting in n8n](https://youtu.be/-Oc_HfreJJE?si=BUmsld-SVd-i8wi2)**

* * *

## **ğŸ¯ Use Cases**

ğŸ“Œ **Marketing Agencies** â€“ Automate client content scheduling.  
ğŸ“Œ **Businesses & Brands** â€“ Maintain a **consistent brand presence** on social media.  
ğŸ“Œ **Content Creators & Influencers** â€“ Generate **high-quality posts** quickly.  
ğŸ“Œ **E-commerce & Startups** â€“ Promote products and services **effortlessly**.  
ğŸ“Œ **Corporate & Enterprise Teams** â€“ Streamline **internal and external communications**.

* * *

## Important

### [Start with n8n](http://n8n.syncbricks.com/)

### [Learn n8n with Amjid ](https://www.udemy.com/course/mastering-n8n-ai-agents-api-automation-webhooks-no-code/?referralCode=0309FD70BE2D72630C09)

### [Get n8n Book](https://lms.syncbricks.com/books/n8n/)

## **ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’» Creator Information**

ğŸ‘¤ **Developed by:** **Amjid Ali**  
ğŸŒ **Website:** [SyncBricks](https://syncbricks.com)  
ğŸ“§ **Email:** [info@syncbricks.com](mailto:info@syncbricks.com)  
ğŸ’¼ **LinkedIn:** [Amjid Ali](https://linkedin.com/in/amjidali)  
ğŸ“º **YouTube:** [SyncBricks](https://youtube.com/@syncbricks)

* * *

## **ğŸ’¡ Support & Contributions**

If you find this workflow helpful, consider supporting my work:

ğŸ‘‰ **[Donate via PayPal](http://paypal.me/pmptraining)**

For full courses on ** AI Automation**, visit:

ğŸ“š **[SyncBricks LMS](http://lms.syncbricks.com)**

ğŸ“š **[AI and Auotmation Course](https://www.udemy.com/course/ai-automation-mastery-build-intelligent-agents-with-lowcode/?referralCode=0062E7C1D64784AB70CA)**

ğŸ‘‰ **[Get Started with N8N](http://n8n.syncbricks.com)**
